title: How to Make Non  Alcoholic Cocktails for a Sleepover for Children

steps.headline: Place lemon juice and sugar into a blender.
Blend for 2 minutes until a thin paste.
Add lemonade/fizzy water.
Blend for 1 and a half minutes until thoroughly mixed.
Add apple juice and orange juice.
Blend for 3 minutes until frothy and orangey.
Pour into a tall cup.
Add a couple of ice cubes, and a straw (optional).
Slice the green stems off of the top of the strawberries, leaving as much strawberry as possible.
Place the strawberries into a blender.
Add ice.
Blend for 3 minutes.
Add milk and cream to the strawberry ice mix in the blender.
Blend for 4 and a half minutes.
Pour into tall glasses.
Crumble a hard sweet biscuit over the top, and add a straw.
Pour 1 cup of frozen berries in a basin or mixing bowl.
Add 1 cup of lemonade.
Add a scoop of any ice cream you would like.
Pour into a tall glass.

text: Sandcastles on the Beach Place lemon juice and sugar into a blender.  Blend for 2 minutes until a thin paste.  Add lemonade/fizzy water.  Blend for 1 and a half minutes until thoroughly mixed.  Add apple juice and orange juice.  Blend for 3 minutes until frothy and orangey.  Pour into a tall cup.  Add a couple of ice cubes, and a straw (optional).  Beach Bum Mini Slice the green stems off of the top of the strawberries, leaving as much strawberry as possible.  Place the strawberries into a blender.  Add ice.  Blend for 3 minutes.  Add milk and cream to the strawberry ice mix in the blender.  Blend for 4 and a half minutes.  Pour into tall glasses.  Crumble a hard sweet biscuit over the top, and add a straw. The biscuit is optional. Seaside skinny Pour 1 cup of frozen berries in a basin or mixing bowl.  Add 1 cup of lemonade. Mix gently to combine. Add a scoop of any ice cream you would like. For example, vanilla or raspberry. Pour into a tall glass. Serve immediately.
